summary: Conversion of Skyrim armour to the UNP skinny Body. WIP.
descriptionHtml:
This is a work in progress and I intend to keep updating this over the course of the next few days (as of 06/08/2012) to bring it up to date. Dawnguard armours will be included eventually, maybe earlier than some of the Vanilla armours depending on demand.
These armours have been modified using Exeters \'UNP Female Armors\'. Thanks to Exeters permission this should be completed allot faster and of a higher quality.

Textures for body on images is not meant for UNP - skinny so they may look odd and have bad seam issues. The HQ textures on some of the armours are amidians book of silence texture replacers by Cabal120.
Which is here- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24909

I would recommend you download the \"UNP female armors\" by Exeter to get the other modified files such as boots, to get the perfect fit.
 
Armour Converted so far:

-Ancient Nord
-Blades Armour
-Dark Brotherhood
-Dragon Scale
-Dwarven
-Ebony
-Elven
-Elven Light
-Falmer
-Fur variants 0,1,2 and 3
-Glass
-Hide, studded, scaled and scaled horn.
-Nightingale
-Steel Plate armour

-Tools Used
3DS Max Design 2012
Nifskope

-Credits
Dimon99 for the UNP Body and UNP Skinny Body. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709
Exeter for the UNP Female Armors. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7305
Bethesda for Skyrim
The Niftools team for Nifskope and Nifscripts
Nightasy for his Mod Tutorials
author: WarlordOdin and Exeter
